text: Niedamirów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lubawka, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland, near the border with the Czech Republic. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Lubawka, south-west of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Niedamirów
